IS590DV - Data Visualization

This is the course website for IS590 Data Visualization in Spring 2019

  • View On GitHub

Week 5 - Types of Viz and Choosing Colors

Please download these datasets for the coding demo:

  • Lake Michigan Bathymetry
  • Brain Scan Data

  • Image

  • Python: Affine Transformations
  • Python: Palette Colors

This week, we covered how colors work, how transformations work, and how we can choose colors and transforms to better suit our data.

  • Recommended Reading: The Mantis Shrimp - The Oatmeal

  • Recommended Listening: Colors - RadioLab

  • Visualization Advice: Why the Rainbow Color Map is Bad
  • Visualization Example: Mapping Every Frame of Every Disney Movie
